problem.markdown:
The efficiency of any engine equals: [ ][mathjaxinline]\frac{Q_{rejected}}{Q_{supplied}}[/mathjaxinline] [x][mathjaxinline]1 - \frac{Q_{rejected}}{Q_{supplied}}[/mathjaxinline] [x][mathjaxinline]\frac{W_{net}}{Q_{supplied}}[/mathjaxinline] [ ][mathjaxinline]1 - \frac{W_{net}}{Q_{supplied}}[/mathjaxinline]
[explanation] C is the definition, B follows from C when we apply the First Law [explanation]
problem.p: The efficiency of any engine equals:

div.p: C is the definition, B follows from C when we apply the First Law
